sentence: While it would be unfair to dismiss Cheney's opposition to Trumpism as insincereshe's surely seen little political benefit for taking the stances she's takenthis might be a good occasion for Democrats to consider how much longer they want to be in the Liz Cheney business, given what a poor defender of democracy she has actually been during her career.
title: The Democrats' complicated dance with neoconservative heiress Liz Cheney
